###Load student basic information file

### Remove values from as_of_status_cd
  ### A
  ### C
  ### E
  ### G

### -------TWO WAYS TO REMOVE THE ROWS WHICH CONTAIN THE VALUES ABOVE-------

  ### NUMBER ONE

### PEIMS_student <- subset(PEIMS_student, !(AS_OF_STATUS_CD %in% c("A","C","E","G")))

  ### NUMBER TWO
  
PEIMS_student <- PEIMS_student[!(PEIMS_student$AS_OF_STATUS_CD %in% c("A","C","E","G")),]
